backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Starting next week, I want a weekly 30-min 1:1 with {name}. Afternoons preferred, avoid Fridays. Automatically reschedule on declines or conflicts.

gutts.name: Parse Scheduling Intent
gutts.capability: Extract user intent and constraints from natural language input
gutts.user_goal: Convert user’s request into structured scheduling parameters
gutts.evidence: Identify recurring meeting request, participant name, duration, start date, time preferences, and constraints

gutts.name: Resolve Participant Identity
gutts.capability: Match {name} to a specific contact or calendar entity
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the correct person is invited to the meeting
gutts.evidence: Map {name} to a unique email/contact in user’s directory

gutts.name: Determine Recurrence Pattern
gutts.capability: Translate 'weekly starting next week' into a structured recurrence rule
gutts.user_goal: Create a weekly recurring schedule starting from the correct date
gutts.evidence: Generate RRULE for weekly 1:1 starting next Monday

gutts.name: Apply Time Preferences
gutts.capability: Interpret and enforce time-of-day and day-of-week constraints
gutts.user_goal: Ensure meetings are scheduled in afternoons and not on Fridays
gutts.evidence: Filter candidate slots to afternoons (e.g., 1–5 PM) and exclude Fridays

gutts.name: Find Optimal Time Slot
gutts.capability: Search calendars for available 30-minute slots matching constraints
gutts.user_goal: Identify a mutually available time that meets all preferences
gutts.evidence: Locate first available afternoon slot next week excluding Friday

gutts.name: Create Calendar Event
gutts.capability: Generate and insert the meeting event into the calendar system
gutts.user_goal: Schedule the agreed-upon meeting in the calendar
gutts.evidence: POST event with recurrence, participants, and time to calendar API

gutts.name: Send Invitation
gutts.evidence: Send email/calendar invite to resolved participant

gutts.name: Monitor for Declines or Conflicts
gutts.capability: Track responses and detect scheduling conflicts post-creation
gutts.evidence: Subscribe to event updates and participant responses

gutts.name: Automatically Reschedule
gutts.capability: Recompute and update meeting time when declines or conflicts occur
gutts.user_goal: Maintain recurring meeting without manual intervention
gutts.evidence: Cancel original slot and book a new one following same constraints
